description: Decompose graphs into their connected components. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://graphviz.org/pdf/ccomps.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Decompose one or more graphs into their connected components:
Print the number of nodes, edges, and connected components in one or more graphs:
Write each connected component to numbered filenames based on output.gv:
